==Typing Undo==
A typing demo application with undo support. Shows how to group commands. Each keystroke is a change command which gets merged based on how fast the text was typed.

[http://fabrication.googlecode.com/svn/examples/typing_undo/bin/index.html Demo]
[http://code.google.com/p/fabrication/source/browse/examples/#examples/typing_undo/src/main/flex View Source]
[http://fabrication.googlecode.com/svn/examples/typing_undo SVN]

==Todolist==
Todo list manager implement with Fabrication. Another showcase of undo-redo. It shows how to support undo/redo of objects.

==Simple Finite State Machine==
A very simple FSM demo using the [http://trac.puremvc.org/Utility_AS3_StateMachine State Machine Utility] with Fabrication. The StateMachine's changed, action and cancel notification are altered enroute using interceptors to remove slashes for use with the respondTo convention.

[http://fabrication.googlecode.com/svn/examples/simple_fsm/bin/index.html Demo]
[http://code.google.com/p/fabrication/source/browse/examples/#examples/simple_fsm/src View Source]
[http://fabrication.googlecode.com/svn/examples/simple_fsm SVN]
